content.question: One piece of evidence that de Gante used in the excerpt to support his overall argument about the treatment of the people of Mexico is that Native Americans

choices.label: were not subjects of the Spanish crown
were first encountered by de Gante himself
had sufficient time to learn about Christianity
did not have enough supplies to support their families

content.answer: did not have enough supplies to support their families

topic.text: 1.6: Cultural Interactions Between Europeans, Native Americans, and Africans

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
